title: China Warns U.S. It Will Retaliate if Pro-Hong Kong Bill Becomes Law
text:
China said that it would retaliate against the U.S. if a bill in Congress condemning the crackdown on pro-democracy protesters in Hong Kong becomes law.

The Chinese Foreign Ministry issued a statement on Wednesday after the bill passed the House unanimously on Tuesday. The statement reiterated China’s view that the protests in Hong Kong are an internal issue and said that if the bill becomes law, it would harm U.S.-Chinese relations and U.S. interests in Hong Kong. It didn’t specify what action it would take in response.
